assets/code-examples/isaac-examples/READ.title: NVIDIA Isaac Code Examples
assets/code-examples/isaac-examples/READ.description: This directory contains example code for the AI Perception & Learning with NVIDIA Isaac chapter, demonstrating key concepts for implementing AI perception systems using Isaac's GPU-accelerated tools.

assets/code-examples/ros2-examples/READM.title: ROS 2 Code Examples
assets/code-examples/ros2-examples/READM.description: This directory contains example code for the ROS 2 Foundations chapter, demonstrating key concepts for humanoid robotics.

chapter-1/index.title: Chapter 1: Introduction to Physical AI & Embodied Intelligence
chapter-1/index.description: This chapter introduces the fundamental concepts of Physical AI and embodied intelligence, exploring how artificial intelligence systems can be designed to interact with and understand the physical world.

chapter-1/references.title: References - Chapter 1: Introduction to Physical AI & Embodied Intelligence

chapter-2/humanoid-ros.title: Humanoid-Specific ROS Implementation
chapter-2/humanoid-ros.description: Introduction to Humanoid Robotics in ROS

chapter-2/index.title: Chapter 2: ROS 2 Foundations for Humanoids
chapter-2/index.description: This chapter introduces the Robot Operating System (ROS 2) as the nervous system for humanoid robotics applications, exploring how ROS 2 provides the infrastructure for implementing the layered architecture discussed in Chapter 1.

chapter-2/references.title: References - Chapter 2: ROS 2 Foundations for Humanoids

chapter-3/digital-twins.title: Digital Twins with Gazebo/Unity
chapter-3/digital-twins.description: Introduction to Digital Twins in Robotics

chapter-3/index.title: Chapter 3: Digital Twins & Physics Simulation
chapter-3/index.description: This chapter explores digital twins and physics simulation techniques for humanoid robotics, covering how simulation environments enable safe development and testing of Physical AI systems before deployment to physical robots.

chapter-3/physics-simulation.title: Physics Simulation Fundamentals
chapter-3/physics-simulation.description: Introduction to Physics Simulation in Robotics

chapter-3/references.title: References - Chapter 3: Digital Twins & Physics Simulation

chapter-4/index.title: Chapter 4: AI Perception & Learning with NVIDIA Isaac
chapter-4/index.description: This chapter explores AI perception and learning techniques using NVIDIA Isaac, focusing on how to implement intelligent perception systems for humanoid robots using GPU-accelerated AI.

chapter-4/nvidia-isaac.title: NVIDIA Isaac Integration
chapter-4/nvidia-isaac.description: Introduction to NVIDIA Isaac for Robotics

chapter-4/references.title: References - Chapter 4: AI Perception & Learning with NVIDIA Isaac

chapter-5/index.title: Chapter 5: Vision-Language-Action Pipelines
chapter-5/index.description: This chapter explores Vision-Language-Action (VLA) pipelines that integrate perception, language understanding, and robotic action for intelligent humanoid systems using frameworks like Whisper, LLMs, and ROS actions.

intro.title: Introduction to Physical AI & Humanoid Robotics
intro.description: Welcome to the comprehensive guide on Physical AI and Humanoid Robotics. This book explores the intersection of artificial intelligence and physical systems, focusing on embodied intelligence and how digital AI models connect with real-world robotics.
